mim.author: ETXJOTJ
mim.name: RcsPMEventM
mim.description: This fragment is used to manage the event jobs on the Managed Element. Once an event job is activated the event data can be collected and sent via streaming or file transfer depending on the capabilities specified.

struct.name: EventFilter
struct.description: Struct used to specify the event filter criteria.

structMember.name: filterName
structMember.description: Filter name. This member contains the name of the referenced EventFilterType MO instance, found in key attribute eventTypeFilterId.

struct.name: ManagedObjectClass
struct.description: This struct represents a Managed Object Class (MOC).

structMember.name: moClassName
structMember.description: This struct member contains the MOC name.

structMember.name: mimName
structMember.description: This struct member contains the name of the Management Information Model(MIM) that contains the MOC.

enum.name: JobControl
enum.description: The level of MS control of the PMEvent job.

enumMember.name: FULL
enumMember.description: MS has Full control of the PMEvent Job. MS can create, delete, start and stop a job.

enumMember.name: STARTSTOP
enumMember.description: MS has Restricted control of the PMEvent Job. MS can stop and start a job, but cannot delete or create it.

enumMember.name: VIEWONLY
enumMember.description: MS can only view the PMEvent job.

enumMember.name: SINGLE_SELECT
enumMember.description: Select one value only from a defined set of options.

enumMember.name: MULTI_SELECT
enumMember.description: Select multiple values from a predefined set, separated by a space.

enumMember.name: INTERVAL
enumMember.description: Select an interval value within the specified range.

enumMember.name: DISTINGUISHED_NAMES
enumMember.description: Select one or more Distinguished Names (DNs) according to the given pattern match.

enumMember.name: REGEXP
enumMember.description: Regular expression.

enum.name: JobState
enum.description: Job state that has been requested.

enumMember.name: ACTIVE
enumMember.description: The job is requested to be activated.

enumMember.name: STOPPED
enumMember.description: The job is requested to be stopped.

enumMember.name: GZIP
enumMember.description: GNU zip file compression type.

enum.name: TimePeriod
enum.description: The different time periods associated with Event Job.

enumMember.name: ONE_MIN
enumMember.description: This represents a one-minute time period.

enumMember.name: FIVE_MIN
enumMember.description: This represents a five-minute time period.

enumMember.name: FIFTEEN_MIN
enumMember.description: This represents a 15-minute time period.

enumMember.name: THIRTY_MIN
enumMember.description: This represents a 30-minute time period.

enumMember.name: ONE_HOUR
enumMember.description: This represents a one-hour time period.

enumMember.name: TWELVE_HOUR
enumMember.description: This represents a 12-hour (720-minute) time period.

enumMember.name: ONE_DAY
enumMember.description: This represents a 24-hour (1440-minute) time period.

enumMember.name: TEN_SECONDS
enumMember.description: This represents a 10-second time period.

enumMember.name: THIRTY_SECONDS
enumMember.description: This represents a 30-second time period.

enum.name: SessionState
enum.description: Actual job state for an event job.

enumMember.name: ACTIVATING
enumMember.description: The job is switching from STOPPED to ACTIVE.

enumMember.name: ACTIVE
enumMember.description: The job is producing events as intended.

enumMember.name: DEACTIVATING
enumMember.description: The job is switching from ACTIVE to STOPPED.

enumMember.name: STOPPED
enumMember.description: The job is passive, either by request or due to other reasons (e.g. overload conditions).

enumMember.name: FAILED
enumMember.description: The job is permanently failed and deactivated. In this state it will not respond to further attempts to activate it. The job may however leave the FAILED state and enter the STOPPED state if the failure reason is removed.

derivedDataType.name: IpDNSAddress
derivedDataType.description: The IpDNSAddress type represents an IP address or a DNS domain name. A version 4 IP address is specified in dotted quad notation, for example 130.100.92.154. RFC 791 describes the syntax in detail. A version 6 IP address is specified by 8 groups of 16 bit hexadecimal values separated by colons, for example, 2001:0db8:85a3:0000:0000:8a2e:0370:7334. RFC 4291 describes the syntax in detail. A DNS name is specified as a fully qualified domain name, for example, myhost.ericsson.com. The internet domain is loosely specified but RFC 1034 recommends a syntax.

class.name: PmEventM
class.description: The Performance Management (PM) Event Management fragment. It is used to manage the event jobs on the Managed Element. Once an event job is activated the events can be collected and sent via streaming and/or file transfer.

attribute.name: pmEventMId
attribute.description: Value component of the RDN.

class.name: EventType
class.description: Defines the event type that can be generated by the Managed Element.

attribute.name: eventTypeId
attribute.description: Value component of the RDN.

attribute.name: triggerDescription
attribute.description: Contains information about what causes the event to be raised.

class.name: EventJob
class.description: Defines the information to be used to activate and configure an event job on the Managed Element.

attribute.name: eventJobId
attribute.description: Value component of the RDN.

attribute.name: description
attribute.description: Describes the content and purpose of the job.

attribute.name: eventFilter
attribute.description:
Event filter or filters to be applied.
This specifies the event criteria which must be valid for the events to be collected and what contents some events shall have. (Examples of what may be specified in a filter: the CellId in a Cell Trace, UE fraction, events related to QoS values, message encoding format, etc).
The filters supported are specified in the EventGroup::validFilters attribute.
The following conditions apply: The order the filters are set does not matter. Only one filter of each type shall be set.

attribute.name: requestedJobState
attribute.description:
The requested state of the job. It represents the state that the job has been ordered to reach.
Possible Values: ACTIVE STOPPED

attribute.name: currentJobState
attribute.description:
The current state of the job.
Possible Values: ACTIVATING ACTIVE DEACTIVATING STOPPED FAILED

attribute.name: fileOutputEnabled
attribute.description: Indicates if event data output will be written to file.

attribute.name: streamDestinationIpAddress
attribute.description: The address of the server that event data should be streamed to. Only required if streamOutputEnabled = true.

attribute.name: streamDestinationPort
attribute.description: The server port that event data shall be streamed to. Only required if streamOutputEnabled = true.

attribute.name: reportingPeriod
attribute.description: Specifies how often event data will be made available. Only applicable when fileOutputEnabled =true. The value must be valid according to the supportedReportingPeriods set by the Managed Element.

attribute.name: streamOutputEnabled
attribute.description: Indicates if event data output will be streamed.

attribute.name: jobControl
attribute.description: Describes the level of MS control of the event job.

attribute.name: eventGroupRef
attribute.description: The Event Group or Event Groups selected for the job. This attribute is set when an entire group or entire groups of events are to be selected for the job.

attribute.name: eventTypeRef
attribute.description: The Event Type or Event Types selected for the job. This attribute is set when an individual event or a subset of the events within a group or groups are to be selected for the job.

attribute.name: fileCompressionType
attribute.description: Compression Type to be applied to file output. Only valid when fileOutputEnabled = true. If this attribute is not set, no compression will be applied to the file output. Can only be assigned a value according to the capability supportedCompressionTypes in the FilePullCapabilities MOC.

attribute.name: streamCompressionType
attribute.description: Compression Type to be applied to stream output. Only valid when streamOutputEnabled = true. If this attribute is not set, no compression will be applied to the stream output. Can only be assigned a value according to the capability supportedCompressionTypes in the StreamingCapabilities MOC.

class.name: EventGroup
class.description: Represents a group of related Event Types.

attribute.name: eventGroupId
attribute.description: Value component of the RDN.

attribute.name: description
attribute.description: Describes the content and purpose of the event group.

attribute.name: moClass
attribute.description: The Managed Object Class that generates events belonging to the event group.

attribute.name: eventGroupVersion
attribute.description: Event Group version identifier. Unique version identifier associated with a change to the contents of the Event Group, where new Event Types have been added.

attribute.name: validFilters
attribute.description: Defines valid filter type definitions for this Event Group.

attribute.name: streamCapabilitiesId
attribute.description: Value component of the RDN.

attribute.name: supportedCompressionTypes
attribute.description:
Supported stream compression type or types.
If this attribute is not present, the compression of event data streams is not supported..

class.name: FilePullCapabilities
class.description: Event capabilities specific to file pull.

attribute.name: filePullCapabilitiesId
attribute.description: Value component of the RDN.

attribute.name: supportedReportingPeriods
attribute.description: Specifies the list of reporting periods supported by the ME.

attribute.name: outputDirectory
attribute.description: Specifies the absolute file path to the Managed Element file system. Event files are fetched form this location.

attribute.name: alignedReportingPeriod
attribute.description: The managed element will align its reporting periods to the hour if set to true.

attribute.name: supportedCompressionTypes
attribute.description:
Supported file compression type or types.
If this attribute is not present, compression of event data files is not supported.

attribute.name: finalROP
attribute.description: Indicates if an event file for the last ROP is expected. When an event job is stopped, this attribute specifies whether a result file for the last ROP is expected (true), or not expected (false).

attribute.name: eventCapabilitiesId
attribute.description: Value component of the RDN.

attribute.name: maxNoOfJobs
attribute.description: This attribute defines the total maximum number of Event Jobs supported by the application.

class.name: EventFilterType
class.description: Describes the available Event Filter Type definitions.

attribute.name: eventFilterTypeId
attribute.description: Value component of the RDN.

attribute.name: description
attribute.description: Event Filter Type description.

attribute.name: filterMethod
attribute.description: Method of filter classification.

attribute.name: valueSpec
attribute.description: Specifies the possible values.

attribute.name: defaultValue
attribute.description: Defined format of filter type value.

class.name: EventProducer
class.description: Event Producer. Allows for multiple types of Event Producer within an Application describing distinct Event functions and capabilities.

attribute.name: eventProducerId
attribute.description: Value component of the RDN.
